page.title: 17YOUNGS SEAFOOD,STOVER.
page.content: At{Youngs Seafood}there were scallops, crabs and sharks.One shark weighed 135 pounds.They handle 4 to 5 tons of crab a day.There are a couple of freezers which keep the fish fresh and the coldest was minus 20 degrees.To help them work there was a machine which was made in America.The price of it was Â£6000.This separates the shell from the meat.There was another generator powered by gas.It was very hot in that room.In one of the rooms there were ten sharks and the man who was talking said a man was carrying a shark and he cut his hands badly.There are several ways to kill the crabs.One way is to put a knife through the middle of the eyes and that pierces the brain,or they can be boiled. The fish come from local ports such as {Brixam and Dawlish.}The fish are then exported to many European countries.
